attributes.action: Close walk-in coffee shops during lockdown, these are not essential.
attributes.additional_details: It is clear when looking at chain coffee shops during the rising tier system .. ultimately resulting in lockdown that, these are possibly a catalyst for Covid infection and spread because of the social relaxed nature. The question must be asked .. if queuing for a coffee is fine why not a beer? Pubs are shut.
attributes.background: Refine the understanding of takeaway essentials .. these shops encourage people to queue .. mostly without adequate social distancing measures

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566768
